prod_desc: Fly Batman™ into battle against Killer Moth™!
prod_long_desc:
Place Batman™ inside the cockpit of the Batcopter and stage an aerial battle between the two Mighty Micros vehicles. Spin the Batcopter’s blades and chase Killer Moth™ in his bug-shaped vehicle, featuring insect eyes, wings and a tail. Throw the Batarang against the Super-Villain, then play out a battle on the ground using Killer Moth’s cocoon gun. Includes two minifigures with mini legs.
Includes two minifigures with mini legs: Batman™ and Killer Moth™.
Batman’s Mighty Micros Batcopter features rotating blades, minifigure cockpit and the Batman™ logo.
Killer Moth’s Mighty Micros vehicle features two translucent-blue wings, decorated bug eyes and a green sting.
Weapons include Batman’s Batarang and Killer Moth’s cocoon gun.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Batman’s Mighty Micros Batcopter measures over 2” high, 2” (6m) long and 1” wide.
Killer Moth’s Mighty Micros car measures over 2” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
set_name: Mighty Micros: Batman™ vs. Killer Moth™
